Package de.kaleidox.crystalshard.core.concurrent

Class ThreadPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.kaleidox.crystalshard.core.concurrent.ThreadPool
  • public class ThreadPool
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the main concurrent implementation.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  ThreadPool.BotOwn
      This class represents an implementation of an executor interface to this current ThreadPool.
      class  ThreadPool.Factory  
      class  ThreadPool.Worker
      This class represents a bot-own worker thread.

      Creates a new limited ThreadPool for the specified discord object.

    • Field Detail

      • BOT_THREAD_EXCEPTION

        public static final java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.IllegalCallerException> BOT_THREAD_EXCEPTION

    • Constructor Detail

      • ThreadPool

        public ThreadPool​(Discord discord)
        Creates a new, unlimited ThreadPool for the specified discord object.
        Parameters:
        discord - The discord object to attach to this ThreadPool.

      • ThreadPool

        public ThreadPool​(Discord discordObject,
                  int maxSize,
                  java.lang.String name)
        Creates a new limited ThreadPool for the specified discord object.
        Parameters:
        discordObject - The discord object to attach to this ThreadPool.
        maxSize - The maximum capacity of workers for this thread. -1 for infinite.
        name - The name for this ThreadPool. New Workers will get this name attached.

    • Method Detail

      • getExecutor

        public java.util.concurrent.Executor getExecutor()
        Gets the executor for this ThreadPool. This will be useful for CompletableFuture async methods that use an executor.
        Returns:
        The executor.
        See Also:
        CompletableFutureExtended, CompletableFuture.supplyAsync(Supplier, Executor), CompletableFuture.acceptEitherAsync(CompletionStage, Consumer, Executor), CompletableFuture.applyToEitherAsync(CompletionStage, Function, Executor), CompletableFuture.completeAsync(Supplier, Executor), CompletableFuture.handleAsync(BiFunction, Executor), CompletableFuture.runAfterBothAsync(CompletionStage, Runnable, Executor), CompletableFuture.runAfterEitherAsync(CompletionStage, Runnable, Executor), CompletableFuture.runAsync(Runnable, Executor), CompletableFuture.thenAcceptAsync(Consumer, Executor), CompletableFuture.thenAcceptBothAsync(CompletionStage, BiConsumer, Executor), CompletableFuture.thenApplyAsync(Function, Executor), CompletableFuture.thenCombineAsync(CompletionStage, BiFunction, Executor), CompletableFuture.thenComposeAsync(Function, Executor), CompletableFuture.thenRunAsync(Runnable, Executor), CompletableFuture.whenCompleteAsync(BiConsumer, Executor)

      • getDiscord

        public DiscordInternal getDiscord()

      • startHeartbeat

        public void startHeartbeat​(long heartbeat)
        This method is used internally to start heartbeating to discord. Do not call this method on your own.
        Parameters:
        heartbeat - The heartbeat interval.

      • execute

        public void execute​(java.lang.Runnable task,
                    java.lang.String... description)
        Schedules a new task. If there is no limit on the ThreadPool or the limit is not hit, ensures that there is a Worker available.
        Parameters:
        task - The task to execute.
        description - A short description on what this task does.

      • getScheduler

        public java.util.concurrent.ScheduledExecutorService getScheduler()
        Gets the Scheduler for this ThreadPool. This will be useful for e.g. updating the discord status.
        Returns:
        The ScheduledExecutorService for this ThreadPool.

      • isBotOwnThread

        public static boolean isBotOwnThread()
        Returns whether the current thread is a BotOwn thread; meaning the current thread is a ThreadPool.Worker Thread. This method is required if you statically want to get a Discord instance using getThreadDiscord().
        Returns:
        Whether the current thread is a bot own thread.

      • requireBotOwnThread

        public static ThreadPool.Worker requireBotOwnThread()
        Checks if the current thread is a BotOwn thread (see isBotOwnThread(), and if so, returns the ThreadPool.Worker Thread.
        Returns:
        The worker thread.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalCallerException - If the thread is not a Bot-Own thread.

      • requireBotOwnThread

        public static ThreadPool.Worker requireBotOwnThread​(java.lang.String customMessage)
        Checks if the current thread is a BotOwn thread (see isBotOwnThread(), and if so, returns the ThreadPool.Worker Thread.
        Parameters:
        customMessage - A custom message to show in the possible exception.
        Returns:
        The worker thread.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalCallerException - If the thread is not a Bot-Own thread.

      • getThreadDiscord

        public static Discord getThreadDiscord()
        Gets the Discord object attached to the current Thread, if the current thread is a ThreadPool.Worker thread. Otherwise throws a IllegalCallerException.
        Returns:
        The discord object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalCallerException - If the thread is not a Bot-Own thread.
        See Also:
        requireBotOwnThread()
